channel.title: Tech on Ryner Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Ryner Tan

item.title: ML Site Reliability Engineer Intern, Tencent
item.description:
Working at Tencent was really enriching & I chanced upon this listing for an ML SRE so I applied & went through the interview pipeline once again!

Decided to do this part-time during Term 7 (SUTD goes by trimesters!) too because I’ve been learning infinitely more in industry roles than in school so why not right.

There I began what I called Project Dora II for lack of a better name (and some semblance of continuity from wanting to contribute more previously). This one was a lot more tooling than observability.

item.title: ML/LLMOps Engineer Intern, Tencent
item.description:
I was planning my life out & chanced upon a DevOps role at Tencent. My previous internship at Home Affairs left me wanting to learn more about the cloud & CI/CD too, so I applied!

After 3 rounds of interviews I was fortunate enough to join Tencent’s Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG). My day-to-day would have been to support operations of well-known games like PUBG Mobile, Pokémon Unite and Honor of Kings but we figured I would be a better fit as ML/LLMOps due to my prior ML experience.

item.title: DevOps Engineer Intern, Ministry of Home Affairs
